name: 3dnotifier
title: 3D Drop In Notifier Panel
description: 3D Notifier lets you broadcast important information to your visitors using a drop down panel that appears at the top of the page. It gently scrolls the page to the top before revealing the panel in a 3D fashion. The panel contents can either be defined inline on the page, or entirely inside an external file and fetched via Ajax. Two modes of appearing are supported-
, where you explicitly open/close the panel, or automatic, where the panel appears automatically once per browser session to each visitor.
